message.body: Sorry to break the silence but this is too funny not to share. Just ran into Charlott and the smile on her face was bigger than anything I've ever seen
Haha oh Lordy... Fuckin Charlott...
Yeah dude....people like that scare me. Anywho hope your valentines day was good. TTY in a few days
Hope you have a goodie too. Ciao ciao
Sorry I called you. It was an emergency but it's okay now and won't happen again sorry
Was in the shower, you all good?
Umm I almost got mugged so no not really. But I'm fine dwai
Well going to worry about it... What happened?

Idk I took the shorter way home I never take and cut across a parking lot and some guy grabbed my arm and told me to give him my money but then these two guys turned the corner and he ran away. Sorry I had no one else to call

It's fine. I was just really shaken up like anything could have happened nd he could have had a weapon and idk. I'll let you go dwai about it don't worry about it I'm sorry I called and jut worried you sorry
It's fine, shit I'm really sorry. I'm glad you're safe now tho
You're all good Sara, no need to apologize. Glad you're safe but that sketch I'm sorry. I'll ttyl tho. Ciao ciao
Yes, actually, there is. I should have known better than to call you. I'll talk to you sunday. Bye.
Did you still wanna talk tonight or leave it for later!
Yeah we can talk tonight, what times good.
You choose, pick a time when you'll be free after, doesn't matter how late.
How about ten?
Will you be free after that? Like we can talk as late as you want, just don't like have somewhere to go after you know?
Yeah for sure I understand, we can talk till whenever from then.
Okay, so you want ten? Cuz whenever is fine by me. But thanks Johnny (: I hope you're not mad at new
I'm not mad at you Sara, you're all good. But yeah ten is good! Ttyt?
Okay, see you then!

I feel like every time we talk it's like a therapy session hah, but thank you for being patient, and trying things my way(: it means a lot to me Johnny. Don't wanna lose my best fwend. But have a nice smoke, enjoy your night, and I'll prlly talk to you to
For sure Sara, I got you. Things will get better. And you too! Ciao ciao
Also sorry for being so crazy, you're very patient, I greatly appreciate it. Just wanted to say that. Ciao ciao
Understood, all is well. Ciao
Ambient waves is def the most you mix ever, but I don't have the order of the songs :/ also idk if you got my email but yeah

I can tell you the list another time. And I got your email. It was very eloquent and I agree and understand it all Sara. For being written at 3am props. You know how I feel you, I want to be friends. Sorry was hardcore napping

Hah no worries, I figured you were (: and I'm really happy about our talk. I mean I know I was a little crazy, but I feel like we got to the root of the problem, and thank you for being understanding. I hope your nap was good (:
But oh y god Johnny idk who else to tell and not sound like a bitch but I got a perfect score on my ling midterm
Hah nice dood! That's awesome. It 'twas good, I straight slept for like four hours hahahah. And I def think we got to the bottom up, happy as well for sure

Ah that's never happened before :D and jelly dude, I could not sleep last night. And I'm very happy. Like I am honestly extremely happy being friends, I just hope you can be as open with me as you are with other friends, I mean it'll take time but you kno
Yeah for sho def got you, time will help that. And well that's awesome tho! Okay to brag. And take a nap?

Yeah, won't be out of class until 5 and then will be too late. Just gonna drink some coffee. And yeah it definitely will, but we will be alright (: I'm happy you're willing to be friends with me at this point. You're pretty great(:
Hah why thank you Sara, and I'm glad that we have been able to work to this point. Takes two ya kno. And I'm about to get an americano hah

Yes it does, so just you know, thank you. Like I'm really grateful for you. Ahh nice, jelly. You should be able to teleport objects with some app :P anyway I got class, focus time. Might hit you up after! Enjoy your americano, ciao!(:
You should play me back in words, I have a good word I wanna use!
Hah I've been out of class for a while, but no worries. And yeah play me back (:
Okay! Ciao ciao Sara! Hope class goes well.
And will do! Fuck just noticed that didn't send
Oh yeah I was just tellin you to play (: have a good night tonight!
Okie! I'm eating currently so ciao ciao tho
You too! And working in a good word hah, bai
Yeah, what's up?
Awake?
Can't sleep meh. Busy?
Nope, just crawled in bed after some greys. Why can't you sleep?
Debos light, zachs snoring... Took a nap today, but went climbing. Idk shud be tired. How's grey?
ah, yes I should be tired but had too much caffeine...even tho that was like Ten hours ago. I'm sorry tho :/ and it was good, saving other shows for tmrw night. How was your night?
Mmm I got you. Yeah had an americano. But it was good, and so was my day. Get sad at night meh. But had an awesome convo with my English teacher, got tazed, climbed and watched skins. Yourself?
Ah why sad? And tazed...? And what was the convo about? But I went to a co op party, just hung out all day basically
Idk, seeing zach sleep with Miranda and also your fb/ instagram pics hah not gonna lie. And like everything! She rules dood! From Kerouac to San Diego to like awesome Mexican food hah.
Okay but you got...tazed??? And ah Johnny, why my pics? And you'll find someone! But that's tight, glad you like her
Oh but like tazed by a tazer stun gun thing. Not that cool really tho
Mhm, yeah was super cool, fifteen minute convo turned into an hour hah. And cuz u party and I no party hah. And cuz Sarah has one and we wanted to try it. We as in John and nick and I
Yes...why? Like wyf!!

Why does she have one? Did it hurt? (ps you guys are such guys) and Johnny, I party because that's all there is to do here. Like otherwise I'd be sitting home alone. You party too! And like have a dozen girls with you, always
You'll find someone else

I meant davita, and cuz her sister was mugged so she sometimes carries it and also has pepper spray. But surprisingly not that bad. And for sure, you don't gotta justify, all good. And yet I feel so alone...
Ah okay, and I still can't believe youdid that. Oh Johnny :/ why? Im always here for you though, I hope you know that. No matter what happens
Hah I can't either, I feel accomplished. Always wanted to try it. And idk, I guess at times I do and don't. I have a good friend base tho. Just nights are the worst ya know?
Do people sneeze in their sleep?
Hah well now you know. And yeah, are you okay with them tho? And yeah, I know. Difficult to think of not having anyone to sleep next to. Sleepibgs a lonely sport
Uhh never heard of that? My roommates snoring tho yay
This is true, sleeping is and I have a tough time going to sleep with my mind running everywhere. And okay with my friends? Yeah for sho, def a good crew. And samezies dood! You ain't alone

That's good, glad you have people who make you happy around you. And yeah same, I don't think I've hone to slept before 3 or 4 in over a month. Wish i had a sleeping buddy, like a giant bear. Ughhh Alison :/
Hahah a giant bear huh? Like a live one or a teddy? And weak sauce... Ah debo is goin to bed now woot! And for sure. How about your homies?

Haha preferably a teddy. And well, humans who like me are very rare, so a a bear will have to do for now! And they're great, def making more friends and getting to be better friends with others, I'm rarely ever alone which is good. Only Maddie and Doriane
Why're they getting to you? And maybe time to move on? And hah well Teddy's are always good and humans like you! Don't lie

Hah well my body. My personality, my mind, me, few like that. And idk like they complain about every little thing and make it a big deal, which is fine but like...not really. Not when I'm trying to be positive about life and all dori does o's complain abo

Nah, I talked to her too, it's all good. Kendall and I are close tho too. Hah well yes, that's inevitable. They are pretty great. But nah, no one here really likes me. Like for me, no one tries to get to know you like that. Idk it's whatever.
What a flat bottomed boat?
Pontoon nvm
Well done. You and seven words.... But that's good, glad Kendall is chill, and I must say she is also pretty too!
But those who matter will get to know you, if they don't want to, fuck em
Yeah, she's gorgeous! I love her. And dude, they're just so bouncy and great! And that's true, time and all. How about you though? Have you been talking to anyone? Indigo?
Mhm, good to have attractive friends hah. Yeah for sho, and truthfully yeah sorta, and you guessed it, which is funny. Thinking of asking her to coffee actually. Is it okay for me to be this open?

Yes yes of course! And you should do that(: exchange some unknown indie music and all that. Hah I always did know(: and really Johnny, don't be afraid of being open. And fuck yeah, attractive friends are the best
Flat tire? Flattened hat?

Hah that's why I'm sticking with John! And also nick too! And no idea for that word? And that's the plan! But got her number via Facebook and such, gonna text her and ask her to coffee to exchange music at a cafe. Good idea?
It's okay, it was beret. Dunno the tire one. And yup, do it. Wow, this doesn't hurt as much as I thought. But maybe that's cu it's really Kate
Late
Beret? Wtf? Yeah idk, still seems kinda weird to me... Like I don't think I'm ready to hear about your boys hah. We shall stop now.
Eh scratch that, it still stings a little

Hah I wasnt gonna tell you anything. And it's fine tho, being open helps a lot. I gotta get used ti it. Just thought you'd move on like physically, before you did emotionally. If that makes sense. Oh and make sure to pay for her. And if she gets a snack g
Hahah okay will do! And yeah I'll tell you once I'm ready for you to be open and such. And idk, that's not me to move on physically I guess? I've like never hooked up really
Yeah no worries. Yeah, idk I guess maybe like wishful thinking on my part? Like didn't think emotionally you'd move on so soon, and like to her. But I'm glad she's pretty and smart and interesting.
Can I tell you something?
I think so, go for it! Hah I dont even know if I like her though ya know. Just going out and putting myself out there ya know? See what happens.

Because like, I know you. And you kind of lied about her and such, idk I just, I know you. Hah honestly, sometimes I wish I was that girl. Like who could just let loose and not care, but I'm not. And now I'm sick :/
Hah word up! I'm not that guy tho ya know? And I don't think youre that girl either. Keep it classy hah. But really? Whys that?
You're sick? And I wish that too, that could be comfortable with that and not care... But yeah, wud be weird. And mmmm I see. Hmph it's late as fuck!

Sore throat, stuffy runny nose meh. Yeah it's hard for me, I care too much, about everyone. I'd do anything for a lot of people and expend so much energy making others happy, or trying to, and few return the favor. But idk how to stop myself. And was that
No not really, just idk how to respond ya know? I love the sound of an inhale. But fuxk being sick, I'm sorry. And for sure i got you, you need to put energy into those who matter.

You love the sound of an inhale? And yeah, it's just difficult because I feel like everyone matters. And I would want people to act with me the way I do with them. Idk relationships between people are so hard to manage. It's like this web that you have to

Like taking a breath in. That sound is so relaxing and invigorating at the same time. #5amdeepthoughts. I think you're worth knowing! And friending! And even girlfriending hah. Be positive sara, you'll find someone great.

Hah there is no one I would rather talk to at 5 in the morning. And yeah, I mean I will, eventually. So will you. Just wish I had someone lined up like you :P eh not really actually. I'd rather start over. I wanna be a lil baby again, all brand new, no mi
Mmm being a baby would rule, our minds wouldn't be full of shit, but our diapers could be and it doesn't matter. So helpless and care free, nothing would matter hah

Ahaha Johnny, you are so great. Indigo would be lucky to have you (: but really, just find someone who makes you happy, who takes you as you are, and stick with them. But don't ditch me along the way(:
Aww why thank you, and yeah hopefully that goes well, maybe make a friend ya know! And I will, and you do the same okay. And i won't Sara. But sleepy time! Ciao and goodnight
I hope it goes well too! Let me me know how it does go! Night Johnny, sleep well(:

Hey it was nice talking to you last night (: when's your coffee date with indigo? (do people ever shorten her name to indie?) ps you should not worry about me, like you can text me whenever and such. I never sleep early Soo yeah
Hah okay for sure, what time you goto bed last night? And no idea hah and still need to ask her. But was def nice talking too Sara

Like 545 ish, hah I have really bad troubles sleeping. And ah well I hope it all works out with her, I mean if anything you'll get an awesome friend out of it (: and yeah, that was nice. Can I ask you something real quick?
Yeah go ahead and ask! But I'm sorry, sleeping pills maybe? And true that

Okay, like is it normal for it to sting when you talk about girls? Don't get me wrong, I want you to be happy, and I want to hear these things, but it's normal for it to hurt a little bit right? I'm rally happy for you tho!(:
She's busy... Hmph... Yeah I think that's gonna happen ya know? But I'm not sure tho, you're call
Aww really? She's busy today? It's a 3 day weekend! She's gotta have some time. Yeah, but like would you feel like that? Ps I'm actually like sad that she can't go, like sad for you
Yeah I guess she's home for the weekend, ffffffuuuuuu. Yeah I'd feel weird about it, thats why I don't ask hah.
Ah where's she from? Hah she'll be back Johnny, relax (: do you like her? And yeah like I wanna help you, so you should tell me things, it really doesn't hurt that bad and I want you to be happy
Idk where she's from, hah need to ask her that. She ain't texting back, meh. And idk if i do. The date would tell me that hahah.

Oh, is she one of those girls who take forever to respond and shit? Is she you in boy form??:P and isn't she from Seattle? I'm a stalker lol. And well I hope she does go with you, coffee is like an easy no pressure thing
Yeah fuxk me, out myself out there and got shot down meh... And not really, she just isn't to this. But I thought she was
What did she say? And it happens to everyone Johnny, you just have to keep trying. Or take a break and learn to make yourself happy and then people will come to you, it'll be alright.
She said that she's home and has to work so she can't... And I was like well maybe sometime later this week :) and nothing back grr. But word, thanks Sara

Hmm, that's kind of aggravating. Hopefully she responds though. You're an amazing man Johnny, anyone would be lucky to have you. But you deserve aomeone who'll make you happy and secure, and you'll find that person in time (: are you okay?
Ohp, she texted back that sounds good! What's that mean in girl? Yeah I'm good, and was fine before she texted me. I just went shopping heh. How're you?

Haha good (: and that can mean both "I'm not gonna text you later" or "I'm gonna expect you to make the effort" or "sounds good." idk how you guys talk, or what your relationship is. Does he seem into you? Ah nice, what'd you get? Who you go with?
And I'm fine
John and nick, got an awesome American flag scarf, and a button down and t shirt. And idk, like when she texted me the first time we talked for a bit, but I can't tell hah

Ah nice, where you go? Oh so she texted you first? What did you talk about? It seems like she'd be into it. Just if she is, make sure you're ready for it. I mean, would you be ready to jump into another relation ship right now?
Buffalo and urban. Well I gave her my number via fb and she texted me. But we've chatted some on fb about stuff. And no, but im just testing the waters ya kno.

Oh I'm going there later! Mardi gras party and nothin to wear. And if she texted you then she def isn't not into it. So just go for it! Do what makes you happy, and hopefully she's a person who treats you the way you should be, and engages you, and just i
Ps if you end up with her, can i finally meet her :P
Yeah for sho well that'll be fun! And yeah maybe? Hah idl how that'd work tho. But yeah true that hopefully it works out.

I hope so. Frat parties arent usually fun tho. Hah well its likely I'm gonna visit Seattle at some point. I'm not Gonna stay away from a city I like cuz you're there, and eventually we might be close enough to visit each other(Austin and his ex are hah, k
Okay. Well in time we shall see ya know. But yeah gotta love Seattle. But yeah, frat parties are sorta weak.

Yeah, but i mean, we can do it, like we can be friends. I mean idk if this is healthy what were doing, but it doesn't feel wrong to me so idk. And hah im def mad I can't go to Seattle now, but it's whatever. But yea, the ratio, the music, all kinda shitty
Yeah for sho, bros and fist pumping huh. You don't like that? Come on? Get fratty! But yeah in time we will see ya know

Hah nope, co ops are fun but frats meh. Whatever I'll give it a shot and go home if it doesn't work. And yeah, it'll be nice to see you in march though. I hope your spring break is fun, and hope you can make some time for me
Yeah we will def have to meet up on the weekend! And yeah we don't got co ops here, lame tho. But can't wait till spring break ahhh

Okay good, glad you're not backing out. Ughh and summer. I love my classes and the people but I just want a break you know? From like the constant stress and pressure. Like every hour there's something else
Like every hour? What do you mean? And I feel yah, want a break super bad, well have Monday off hah.

Idk it's like i fix one thing, and something else happens. Like there's a different fight to fight all the time, and that's life, and I just have to stop waiting for it to get better, I have to just be relieved that I can stay positive. And yeah Monday wi
I know, that wuda been real nice. Like uc had it off huh? But that's true, just gotta hang in there and focus on the positive while dealing with the negative

Yeah, like just colleges don't have Friday I think. Hehe did you see the pillow pet I bought Alex?(: and yup, just sucks when like I'm the only one with that mentality, like everyone else's problems stress me out a lot
Ps you should just jump on tht karlyn chick, she wants yo dick
Mhm i got you, hah gtfo about karlyn, I like don't even know her. But my phones about to die, so I'll ttyl! But yeah that pillow pet looked awesome hah.
Mmk bye!
Hey this is kind of a weird question, but do any of your friends try to like control what you do up there? I don't know how to deal with it
Not really, actually none of em. That's weird... Who's doing that?
Doriane...idk like she's been talking down to me a lot, and kind of telling me what to do. And it's making me feel really anxious and like I have eyeliner on and I can't cry ahaha
I'm sorry, well tell her no. And tell her to fuxk off hah. That's stupid tho.
Hah I can't, like it involves something that she's gonna do and isn't letting me do. Whatever tho, idk I don't even want to go out :/ but I'll let you go sorry for texting you
Okay well I hope it works out, ciao for now
Okay? Hope your night turns out alright.
Hah yeah, have a good night. Hopefully you can sleep tonight! Feel free to hit me up if you can't
(although I guess now you have indigo to talk to)
Hah sorry I meant that in a good way! Never mind. I'll just stop talking to you, I keep fuxking everything up
No you don't, ciao Sara. Hope you're all good
Thats a lot of beer hah, and you said you don't party
Hah well drinking in a dorm. Six patch for each, but not killing it.
Six pack for each person? Damn you guys!
Haha that's really not that much tho...
Hah tru dat. Well you have fun then! Get gnarly breh! Get shwasted. Or stupid faceded

K yah that's just weird
Hah that was sorta weird, and I'm not gona get it in Sara...
Sorry!! I'm tryin to be like your bro hahaha. Not working huh?
Haha you can be my bro, but I'm not gonna get it in hah.
Hah okay, I'll be like your girl bro(: it'll be awesome!
Hah okay that sounds like a plan to me. Down with that
Haha shweet(: hope you're having loads of fun!
Hah yeah, not loads but good times. How're you?
Feel yah and I'm good, Chillin with the crew. But I'll ttyl! Ciao for now
Hah I'm good, getting fratty and what not! Just fun win the girls. You?
By eeeee it's dance time (: have fun and get gnarls
Johnny I miss you because I always had someone to walk me home and I would never get almost mugged
Im sorry, you won't get mugged and if you feel sketch you can always call me or another guy friend
Oh my gosh I'm sorry I'm embarrassed for texting you that. I hope your night was fun tho
No I just am like, I totally would do that. I'm sorry for bothering you and hope I didn't wake you
Did you not realize? And you too Sara
Hah you're all good, still up. I'll ttyl tho, be safe! Ciao ciao
Haha okay, thank you. And I found Ahbishek, he's got my back. Have a good one Johnny thank you
Hehe fo shua barrada :P
For shua, later!
What was that shit we bought you when you were sick in Seattle?
Ohhh yes. Thank you
Mucinex!
Word, hah I Srsly woke up the instant before you sent that
Haha oh good. Maddie woke me at 11:/ and I'm growing fond of our late night chats, it's kind of bad
Damn fuxk that noise and word, I feel like we shudnt do em. Sleep is important hah
What noise? Well if you say so, no more chats
Hah I just meant like fuxk that. And no I mean we can, but you gotta get better Sara. I like em too.
Hah yeah, she always does that so I'm used to it. Hah yeah, that I do, but talking to you is so much fun (: about girls and ahit
Hahah really? It's fun? Cus I suck at it? Hah. But weak sauce
Hah no, cuz I wanna help you and want you to be happy and be okay (: idk I just want things to work out well with you, cuz for me they aren't. And yeah hopefully I get better
They aren't for you? And yeah hopefully, you shud t go out tonight heh
I want your love life/life life to work out cuz mine isn't. And ah fuck def not. Prlly gonna stay home and watch a movie, but no one to watch with meh :/ my friendies don't wuv meh
Heh you and your baby talk, I'm sure they do Sara. But that's a good call. And how/why isn't your life working out?
Hah you know me, and they do but not enough to watch a movie with me instead of going out. And eh it doesn't matter, my life is good, just boys are dumb:P
Oh wow, don't base your life off of boys Sara. Just cus one doesn't work out, there is always more fish in the sea... Cliche but for real.
Haha no that's what I'm saying, my life is good but boys are lame. And it's a bummer were not I'm the ocean then :P hehehe I'm si clever
Oh like love life is particular got chya. Do you wana ask me questions about boy translations? Srsly tho, miss marine sooooooooooo much!
Haha no I'm all good. I know exactly what they mean, they just don't make sense. And dude fuck yeah, my dad tells be about his walks on the beach and I just get so jelly! Want summer si bad!
Oh no I can't go to the beach wih you :/ this just made me sad
Ah word, walking onthe beach is the best! Fuck. And you'll have other friends Togo with! And we make more sense than girls!
Yeah, summer will be amazing. Hah I know I will, but you're more fun, cuz you "womp" And what not. I hope we're chill enough to hang out tho eventually, like personally wouldn't be too weird for me
Mhm for sure, and I think I'd be okay with it... But I can't really know until I see you in person ya know? Fuxk I wana womp
Yeah, exactly. I don't think it's be too weird. Like we can still hang out with our mutual friends and all you know? And I wanna go to the beach do bad
Yeah for sure, Andre and Stefan and Alex and such. And I know, just the mentality and mindset of the beach. Fuck
Yeah, I'm really happy with where we are right now (: like so grateful for you and this right now, you have no idea. And yes, def miss that! But bleh don't wanna be sick
Mmm yeah being sick sucks dood, is it cold there? And yeah I'm content too with this, Tis good

It's windy but sunny, so sort of. And yeah, I'm glad you're okay with this too, let me know if I overstep ever or if anything makes you uncomfortable though, I really hope we can maintain our friendship
Yeah for sho, and I think we will be able to. And got chya, yeah the wind sucks. But I ttyl cool?
Yup I'm gonna take a nap now(: and yeah we'll be fine Johnny, meep well be good and everything will be okay
For shua, ciao for now! Bai

Nice, not MySpace? Weird
Facebook.

Oh reallySTOP

What?
I'll stop. I'm eating right now tho. Can I ttyl?
Oh got it, totes missed em
Bai

Byee

Sorry to be hot and cold but I don't think we should talk about Indigo anymore unless I specifically ask. It's hurting me a lot more than I thought it would and it's kind of hitting me Really Bad. I'm sorry about that.
Okay that's completely understandable. Truthfully I don't think anything will come of that btw the Sara. What're u up to?

Idk to me it feels like, you met her at the beginning of last quarter, put her aside to see how worth it I really was, and decided I wasn't and tried her again. Idk it just really hurts. And about to smoke with Ahbishek and watch pirates with Kendall. You
Nice, which pirates? And you actually think I had that ulterior plan Sara? Why the fuck? I just met her early on and she seemed cool and now I'm pursuing to be friends or something more...

I'm saying what it feels like, I know you wouldn't do that, but like even the fact that you're already looking for another relationship. Idk it just really hurts, more than I thought. I was ignoring it, and it hurts that I'm not worth it. And idk which pi
What're yiu doin?
Bout to chill with John and such, and okay we tried it and now we don't have to talk about it. And you aren't? I'm not really pursuing anything that intensely, just testin the waters...

Exactly, I'm not worth it to you, that hurts. And yeah I mean good luck and I want you to be happy. Like if yiu meet someone I'd appreciate you telling me but I'm gonna ease up on giving you advice cuz I'm just sabotaging myself
Okay sounds good, well I mean I've already explained everything to you Sara. So maybe we should talk less? Idk what to do that'll help us.

Yeah I know yiu did but that doesn't make it suck any less. And yeah idk I'm ginna try and be friends, like we should still Skype once in a while, idk maybe I'm just sick and feeling lonely right now haha :P I hope you're okay tho
I'm good and definitely feel lonely alot too, but I feel it's a passing phase. And okay, well we can still talk some and such ya know.

Yeah, hah wish it would go away. Sad to say it only really does when I have something completely engaging going on around me. Yeah I don't wanna cut off all contact, like I enjoy our chats, no matter how late :P
Yeah for sho I got you, would be weird to cut off all contact ya know. It's good to talk. And this is true! You ain't alone
Yes it def helps, makes me feel less lonely, which is kind of sad I guess. But dude, I'm going ti see Seth Meyers on Tuesday (: meh I guess I just miss talking to you yiu know?
Oh nice, for free? Shud be good stuff. An yeah well I think that's a given, it's not sad Sara.
Nah only like 17 tho. Super stoked! And okay, does talking make you feel less lonely? Or are you ambivalent?
No it def does, especially at night when it strikes hard ya know. And that'll be cool tho!
Alrighty, well I'm gonna watch my movie now, hah I'll probably talk to you tonight when I'm all sad again, if that's okay
Yeah might be busy, but sounds good. Ciao ciao to
Oh okay well never mind.
I'm not bitter. I won't talk to you tonight Johnny don't worry. Have fun wih your drinking crew or whatever
Don't be bitter. I'm just not making any promises Sara...
This is you being bitter. Seriously dood, now you're crossing the line.
Oh my god Johnny...
I am not bitter that you won't talk to me tonight. I hope you have fun. I also hope you stop making assumptions about what I'm feeling based on texts. Bye
I'm done with this convo. Ciao for now.
Goodbye.
Sorry Johnny. No need to be rude. TTY whenever
